text: Mbe ndu nzuaim, ndu mba nuiana sɨgeŋ ndi mbaim, harigi guma ne ga vhezgi fhuvara, ndu vuzvuk ma. Ndu ne ndi mbarav ŋkɨɨa ndigi, nta vhɨra ndun ŋkɨɨa ma, ndu ram mba ŋkɨɨar muun saŋv, ndu vuzvuk ma. Ndu ram muuŋgiap kha ndɨkndɨga mbatɨga ndigi? Ndu khueŋ ndɨkndɨgɨ thari. ‘Gu kha gumgira guiguigi.’ Zakɨra fhuvara! Ndu Fhe Bakɨmera guiguigi.”
